author: Clement Uwiringiyimana
title: Under coronavirus lockdown, Rwandans remember genocide from home
description: Valerie Mukabayire lost her husband in Rwanda's genocide. Now she and her family know they need to stay strong to honour his memory as they join the country's fight against the coronavirus.
content:
